location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Sir Gore Ouseley, at Bushire, to William Bruce Esq., Acting Resident at Abusheher

mods.abstract: Letter from Sir Gore Ouseley, at Bushire, to William Bruce Esq., Acting Resident at Abusheher [Bushire], enclosing a copy of a letter received from Captain Heathcote of H M S Lion,and requesting Bruce to comply with the Captain's wishes to send Europeans on the Palamarto Basra, to order the crew of Natives, and to have them employed at the Factory until the return of H M S Lion(letter not included).
